name: Mazoandom
description: Hello there, Let me guide you about what you would be expecting from this game. This is basically a 3D Zombie Shooter game but wait... there is a catch. In this game, you'll be spawned inside a MultiFloor maze (Every Maze you play will be a random Maze) where you have to find the exit path and kill zombies. Sounds like fun now? Well then try it out yourself.
